song.englishname: Let The Flame Burn Brighter (with Psalm Drummers)

english.segment1: We'll walk the land. With hearts on fire. And every step will be a prayer. Hope is rising. New day dawning. Sound of singing. Fills the air
english.segment2: Two thousand years. And still the flame. Is burning bright. Across the land. Hearts are waiting. Longing, aching. For awakening. Once again
english.segment3: Let the flame burn brighter. In the heart of the darkness. Turning night to glorious day. Let the song grow louder. As our love grows stronger. Let it shine, let it shine
english.segment4: We'll walk for truth. Speak out for love. In Jesus' name. We shall be strong. To lift the fallen. To save the children. To fill the nation. With your song
english.segment5: Graham Kendrick. Copyright Â© 1989 Make Way Music
